name: Joe Biden
title: President
bio: Joe Biden is the 46th president of the United States. He was inaugurated on January 20, 2021.

name: Kamala Harris
title: Vice President
bio: Kamala Harris is the 49th vice president of the United States, inaugurated on January 20, 2021.

name: Antony Blinken
title: Secretary of State
bio: Antony Blinken is the Secretary of State under the Biden administration, responsible for overseeing foreign affairs.

name: Janet Yellen
title: Secretary of the Treasury
bio: Janet Yellen is the first woman to serve as Secretary of the Treasury, appointed in 2021.
